content.text:
# Rhododendron 'President Roosevelt'

'Rhododendron'' 'President Roosevelt' 'is a popular cultivar of Rhododendron with striking variegated leaves and trusses of bright red flowers that fade to white in the centre. It is named after the 26th president of the United States, Theodore Roosevelt. Height 150â€“180 cm.
References
*Salley, Homer E., & Greer, Harold E. Rhododendron Hybrids, 2nd Edition'' 1992. Timber Press.
